languages.text: Стену, разрушенную во время нападения друкари, частично восстановили. Чья-то дерзкая рука оставила неприметную надпись: "При ксеносах было лучше".
The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."
languages.original_text: Стену, разрушенную во время нападения друкари, частично восстановили. Чья-то дерзкая рука оставила неприметную надпись: "При ксеносах было лучше".

traits.locale_text: The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."
The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."
The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."
The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."
The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."

languages.text: Die Wand, die bei dem Drukhari-Angriff zerstört wurde, ist zum Teil wieder aufgebaut. Eine mutige Hand hat eine unscheinbare Nachricht hinterlassen: "Unter den Xenos war es besser."
languages.original_text: The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."

traits.locale_text: Die Wand, die bei dem Drukhari-Angriff zerstört wurde, ist zum Teil wieder aufgebaut. Eine mutige Hand hat eine unscheinbare Nachricht hinterlassen: "Unter den Xenos war es besser."

languages.text: Le mur, détruit lors de l'attaque des Drukharis, a été partiellement reconstruit. Quelqu'un a laissé un message audacieux et mystérieux : « Je préférais le règne des xénos. »
languages.original_text: The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."

traits.locale_text: Le mur, détruit lors de l'attaque des Drukharis, a été partiellement reconstruit. Quelqu'un a laissé un message audacieux et mystérieux : « Je préférais le règne des xénos. »

languages.text: 这堵墙在黑暗灵族袭击期间被摧毁了，如今已部分重建。不知是哪个胆大包天的人，在这堵墙上写下了不起眼的小字：“还不如让异形管事呢”。
languages.original_text: The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."

traits.locale_text: 这堵墙在黑暗灵族袭击期间被摧毁了，如今已部分重建。不知是哪个胆大包天的人，在这堵墙上写下了不起眼的小字：“还不如让异形管事呢”。

languages.text: El muro, que quedó destruido durante el ataque de los Drukhari, se ha reconstruido parcialmente. Una mano osada ha dejado un mensaje discreto: «Estábamos mejor con los xenos».
languages.original_text: The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."

traits.locale_text: El muro, que quedó destruido durante el ataque de los Drukhari, se ha reconstruido parcialmente. Una mano osada ha dejado un mensaje discreto: «Estábamos mejor con los xenos».

languages.text: デュカーリの攻撃によって破壊された城壁は、部分的に再建された。大胆な何者かが、人目につきにくいメッセージを残している。「異種族の支配下にあった頃の方がよかった」
languages.original_text: The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."

traits.locale_text: デュカーリの攻撃によって破壊された城壁は、部分的に再建された。大胆な何者かが、人目につきにくいメッセージを残している。「異種族の支配下にあった頃の方がよかった」

languages.text: Drukhari saldırısı esnasında yıkılan surun bir kısmı onarılmış. Cesur biri, göze çarpmayan bir mesaj bırakmış: "Zenolar çok daha iyiydi."
languages.original_text: The wall, which was destroyed in the Drukhari attack, has been partially rebuilt. A bold hand has left an inconspicuous message: "It was better under the xenos."

traits.locale_text: Drukhari saldırısı esnasında yıkılan surun bir kısmı onarılmış. Cesur biri göze çarpmayan bir mesaj bırakmış: "Zenolar çok daha iyiydi."
